articles.author: Jonathan M. Gitlin
articles.title: Weight saving and aero optimization feature in the 2025 Porsche 911 GT3 - Ars Technica
articles.description: Among the changes are better aero, shorter gearing, and the return of the Touring.

articles.title: Hidden Hunger Crisis: Alarming Study Reveals Half of Diabetics Are Missing Essential Nutrients - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Micronutrient deficiencies, such as low vitamin D and magnesium, are alarmingly common in people with type 2 diabetes, affecting nearly half globally Women and those in the Americas are at higher risk, and the study underscores the importance of addressing no…
articles.content:
Hidden hunger affects nearly half of those with type 2 diabetes, with deficiencies in vital nutrients like vitamin D, magnesium, and B12 prevalent globally.
